goal.ch: 《書經》為我國今存最古之史書，冶經、史於一爐，本課程即在闡述《書經》之內容、價值及讀法，俾使學者瞭解上古文明及史實，藉以探究經史之大義。
goal.en: “The Book of Books“ is the oldest surviving history book in our country. It combines classics and history in one place. This course explains the content, value and reading method of “The Book of Books“ so that scholars can understand ancient civilizations and historical facts, and explore the classics. The righteousness of history.

outline.ch:
一、文獻問題概說
1.《尚書》的名義與體例
參考資料：偽《孔安國序》、《尚書正義》選。
單元目標：對《尚書》（含《書序》）及《尚書正義》的編纂形式有基本的認識。
2. 今、古文《尚書》──文字風格篇
參考資料：《說命》上、《盤庚》上。
單元目標：通過《商書》分屬今文和偽古文的篇章之閱讀，體會兩者文字風格的差異。
3. 今、古文《尚書》──真偽篇
參考資料：《尚書集釋》概論之相關部分，蔡沈《書集傳》選。
單元目標：了解判斷今古文《尚書》真偽的理由，並能區分今文與偽古文之篇章。
二、歷代研究成績
1.唐以前  2.宋、元  3.明清   4.民國
參考資料：《四庫全書總目‧尚書類》選
單元目標：了解歷代研究《尚書》的重要成果。
三、重要篇章選講（篇名依《尚書正義》）
單元目標：通過實際篇章之閱讀，對《尚書》之內容有較具體的認識。篇章之解釋，以屈萬里《尚書集釋》為主，並參考《尚書正義》、《書集傳》對相關義理之闡發。
1. 儒家聖人的源頭與形象（堯舜禹）：《堯典》、《舜典》、偽《大禹謨》
2.儒家暴君的代表（桀紂）：
2.1五誓：《甘誓》、《湯誓》、《牧誓》、《費誓》、《秦誓》［偽《泰誓》］
2.2《高宗肜日》、《西伯勘黎》、《微子》
outline.en:
1. Overview of literature issues
1. The name and style of “Shang Shu“
Reference materials: Selections from the pseudo “Kong Anguo Preface“ and “Shang Shu Zhengyi“.
Unit goal: Have a basic understanding of the compilation form of “Shang Shu“ (including “Preface“) and “Shang Shu Zhengyi“.
2. Modern and ancient Chinese “Book of Documents“ - Writing Style
Reference materials: “Shuo Ming“ (Part 1) and “Pangeng“ (Part 1).
Unit goal: Through reading the chapters of “Shang Shu“ that belong to modern texts and pseudo-ancient texts, understand the differences in writing styles between the two.
3. Modern and ancient Chinese “Book of Documents“ - Authenticity and Falsehood
Reference materials: Relevant parts of the introduction to “Collected Interpretations of Shangshu“, selected from Cai Chen‘s “Biography of Collections of Books“.
Unit goal: Understand the reasons for judging the authenticity of the modern ancient text “Shang Shu“, and be able to distinguish between modern texts and pseudo-ancient texts.
2. Research achievements of past dynasties
1. Before Tang 2. Song and Yuan 3. Ming and Qing 4. Republic of China
Reference materials: Selections from “General Catalog of the Complete Collection of Siku Quanshu - Shangshu Category“
Unit goal: Understand the important results of studying “Shang Shu“ in the past dynasties.
3. Selection of important chapters (the title is based on “Shang Shu Zhengyi“)
Unit goal: Through reading actual chapters, have a more specific understanding of the content of “Shang Shu“. The explanation of the chapters is mainly based on Qu Wanli‘s “Shangshu Jishi“, and refers to “Shangshu Zhengyi“ and “Shujizhuan“ to elucidate the relevant meanings.
1. The origin and image of Confucian saints (Yao, Shun, and Yu): “Yao Dian“, “Shun Dian“, and pseudo “Dayu Mo“
2. Representative of Confucian tyrants (Jie Zhou):
2.1 Five oaths: “Gan Oath“, “Tang Oath“, “Mushu Oath“, “Fei Oath“, “Qin Oath“ [pseudo “Tai Oath“]
2.2 “Gaozong Xunri“, “Xibo Kanli“, “Weizi“
